articleContent:
✦Event Duration✦
From now on - 2025-06-11 23:59 (UTC+8)
 
✦How to Participate✦
Use Wuthering Waves' Camera feature or your screenshot to capture in-game footage. Post your work with hashtags #WutheringWaves and #wuwamoment included on X (Twitter)/Instagram/Facebook and fill out the form below for a chance to win Astrites, cash incentives, and more!
*Please quote your post link published publicly on social media.
 
✦Rewards✦
We'll select winners across all event platforms based on both quality and statistics. Winners will receive Astrites, cash incentives, and Sigil: Rhythmic Echoes x1.
If you submit a purely scenic image, there is a chance that it will be selected for display in the in-game loading interface.
 
View images for details about the event rules and proceed to submit: https://forms.gle/pU36UNBePp4nsk5y8
articleTitle: [Tidal Photography] Now seeking top photographers for Solaris!
